column1: Sidi Moussa is a commune in the Baraki District of the Algiers Province and a suburb of the city of Algiers in northern Algeria. It is situated 15 kilometers south of central Algiers.
The commune was heavily struck by the Algerian Civil War: In 1993 and 1994 death squads conducted killings
column2: in January 1997 there were further murders and in August 1997 the Rais massacre took place.
